page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN RADSTOCK
page.content: Many people in Radstock work in shops or factories.They produce industrial bags and shoes.There are also a number of small industries in the area.Many people who are unemployed are teenagers who have just left school. They go for training to see how well suited they are at different jobs.Many people commute to their place of work in Bath or Bristol. Some jobs are taken up with farming though there are not so many farms around the Radstock area.People can get part-time jobs from farmers because sometimes the farmers need people to help them at certain times in the year.
